tasks.task_description: Add list UI components for args field with add/remove functionality
Add list UI components for env field with add/remove functionality
Update the save/load logic to handle the new list components

description: Extend MCPProxy configuration page to show args and env as editable lists with add/remove functionality
context: Found the configuration dialog implementation in config_dialog.go. It's an HTML-based dialog served via HTTP. The current template has basic fields but no list UI for args and env fields.

Added list UI components for both args and env fields with add/remove functionality. Updated HTML template with list containers, CSS styles for list items, JavaScript functions for adding/removing items, and updated the form data collection logic to handle the dynamic lists.
